segments.text: It's an interesting study in parallel realities here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so serene, completely oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water steadily streaming over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a widening puddle right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, engaged in their own risky adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is just begging to collapse under the boy's weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so angry to see such carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to get hurt, or at least drenched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the splashing or feel the cold water?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about what's unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a bit frustrating to just watch it all play out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything looks so calm from her perspective, but it's not.
segments.speaker: PAR
